## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4feeabe972dbf8a97f4ab7dc12a732e46cb7ac49559cccdb432dc3513b3f6c38)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'bombombombom' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
